actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide a study to be made of certain conditions hazardous to boating safety at the entrance to Mission Bay Harbor, San Diego, Calif.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Army to make a study of navigational conditions hazardous to boating safety at the entrance to Mission Bay Harbor, San Diego, California.

titles.title: A bill to provide a study to be made of certain conditions hazardous to boating safety at the entrance to Mission Bay Harbor, San Diego, Calif.
